summary: Just some things I whipped up in some spare time.
descriptionHtml:
In the archive are four files. Below is a description of each.
Comment if you would like to see something added/removed.

===Reset Perks===
To use, open the console and type \"bat resetperks\" 
 - This removes all perks and sets the skill level to 15.
 - Sets level back to 1.
 - Magicka, Stamina and Health are back to 100.
 - Sets Carry Weight to 300.

===All Perks===
To use, open up the console and type \"bat allperks\"
 - This gives you all perks and sets the skill level to 100.
 - Makes you a level 50.
 - Magicka, Stamina, and Health are set to 500.
 - Sets Carry Weight to 5000.
 

===High Smithing and Enchanting===
To use, open the console and type \"bat highsmithenchant\"
 - Sets Smithing to 15,000,000.
 - Sets Enchanting to 1000.
 - Gives you 100 Ebony Ingots
 - Gives you 100 Black Soul Gems filled with a Grand Soul.
 - Gives you A full Daedric set, including a sword, a bow, and 1000 arrows. 
***Damage on the bow is NOT 471, it is 4,718,305***

===Extreme Smithing and Enchanting===
To use, open the console and type \"bat extremesmithenchant\"
 - Sets Smithing to 20,000,000.
 - Sets Enchanting to 5000.
 - Gives you 100 Ebony Ingots
 - Gives you 100 Black Soul Gems filled with a Grand Soul.
 - Gives you A full Daedric set, including a sword, a bow, and 1000 arrows. 
***Damage on the bow is NOT 629, it is 6,291,055***

===Ebony Armor===
To use, open the console and type \"bat ebony\" 
 - Gives you a full set of ebony armor. 

===To install===
Extract the four files to the same location as your TESV.exe. 
Usually C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\ Skyrim

===KNOWN BUGS===
Causes game to crash when using More Craftables.

I will be adding more soon.
author: n1kko
